alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 7:19PM EDT until July 24 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fairfield County in central Ohio... Southwestern Licking County in central Ohio... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 719 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pataskala, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Newark, Heath, Granville, Pataskala, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Beechwood Trails, Harbor Hills, Granville South, Fairfield Beach, Thornport, Etna, Kirkersville, Interstate 70 at State Route 37 and Interstate 70 at State Route 13. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 117 and 135. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
